issues.description: The Lecture constructor in the solution is declared with default (package-private) visibility, but the exercise description implicitly expects students to create a public constructor.
issues.suggested_fix:
Add the public modifier to the constructor definition: e.g.
public Lecture(String lectureName, int numberOfInscribedStudents, int numberOfGuestStudents, int numberOfLecturers, int numberOfTutors) { â€¦ }
